rows.label: qev010801_MSG0001
rows.name:
So we got orders to go check out this cave or whatever
up north? But I'm thinking, "Hey, can we not?"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0002
rows.name:
You're a BLADE, right? You know what it's like.
You been saddled with any annoying missions lately?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_JNK0010
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: qev010801_SEL0011
rows.name:
Complain that you've got some pretty
annoying assignments yourself.

rows.label: qev010801_JNK0020
rows.name: Chide

rows.label: qev010801_SEL0021
rows.name: Remind Carl that every last assignment is important.

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0003
rows.name:
Ha! Sounds like you and me have a lot in common.
At least now we both have a friend to vent with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0004
rows.name: And speaking of, get a load of this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0005
rows.name:
Sheesh. So serious! Doesn't it get exhausting living your
life like that? Loosen up that tie a little![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0006
rows.name:
Anyway, why don't you sit there quietly and listen
to me gripe about work, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0007
rows.name:
So this cave, right? That we're supposed to look at?
Total nest of nasty monsters. Because, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0008
rows.name:
And they're like, "It could be dangerous to leave them
alive!" Which is secret big brass code for "Go kill 'em
all, grunt!" Which, just...ugh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0009
rows.name:
Man, I just don't get it. Why does Trevor keep
dumping the awful jobs on ME?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0010
rows.name:
Maybe if I wait long enough, some lone combat nut
will stumble across the cave and go all commando.
Take care of it for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0011
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0012
rows.name:
Wait, I saw that look. That was totally a look!
You want this job, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0013
rows.name:
Seriously? You'll really go? Holy smokes, I can't
BELIEVE that worked! I should have tried it ages ago.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0014
rows.name:
Okay then. First, you should just go scout the cave out,
you know? If you leave through the west gate, it's a
little bit north.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0015
rows.name:
I know it might sound a little hypocritical of me to say
this, but...weren't those animals all here first?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0016
rows.name:
Then we crash-land, slap a city down on their planet,
and start blasting everything we see. Kinda makes us
seem like the bad guys, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0017
rows.name:
Oh well. Toss that moral burden on the pile of reasons
why I can't be bothered. Anyway, cave's out the west
gate and a bit north. Thanks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0018
rows.name:
Hey, welcome back!
How'd the native-animal slaughter thing go?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0019
rows.name:
...How's that again? You killed the piglets?
Then the mama came out and you killed her, too?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0020
rows.name:
Ugh. Killing a parent trying to protect its children
is just...damn. That's heavy stuff, [ST:gender p1=brother p2=sister ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0021
rows.name:
I mean, they were just one big happy family till we
showed up. Probably had holiday dinner together and
everything. Pictures hanging in the living room...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0022
rows.name:
But then WE come along and just senselessly murder
the entire family for our convenience! How messed up
is THAT?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev010801_SEL0031
rows.name: Agree that it's pretty messed up.

rows.label: qev010801_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev010801_SEL0041
rows.name:
Assert that anything standing in the way
of mankind's survival must be eliminated!

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0023
rows.name: What a bummer. I am so bummed right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0024
rows.name:
Uh, okay? Kind of a psycho answer if you ask me,
but I'm not about to argue with the person who just
gave it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0025
rows.name:
Still, I WAS the one who sent you out there,
so I'm going to pay you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0026
rows.name:
This whole thing leaves a bad taste in my mouth.
Bleaaaarrrgh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0027
rows.name:
Hey, welcome back!
How'd the native-animal slaughter thing go?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0028
rows.name: Oh, you let 'em go?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0029
rows.name:
No, I totally get it. Monsters or not, you'd still feel bad
about killing kids.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev010801_SEL0051
rows.name: Nod in agreement.

rows.label: qev010801_JNK0060
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev010801_SEL0061
rows.name:
Express concern that you
may have hurt the mission.

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0030
rows.name:
I'm so glad I asked someone nice like you,
[ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0031
rows.name:
Aw, don't worry about it. We'll figure out some other
way to fix the problem that doesn't involve killing
innocent children.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0032
rows.name:
Hereâ€”I swiped this from storage.
It's not much, but help yourself![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0033
rows.name:
I'll take it from here. My superior, Trevor, will probably
have some ideas on how to proceed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010801_MSG0034
rows.name:
Heh, doing good always gets me pumped.
What a rush, right?![ST:wait ]
